response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth noting that the product is valued at $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a limited-time warranty and dedicated support. I trust this proposal aligns well with your budget and strategic goals. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 9500}
